title: How Digital Products Enable the Energy Transition
content: The three Ds—decarbonization, decentralization, and digital enablement—are resulting in significant disruptions across all aspects of the energy and utility sector. In many instances, utilities themselves are spearheading these changes in this intricate new landscape. As the energy transition continues, the demands of utility consumers are evolving, necessitating enhanced tools for utility employees to effectively manage these changes. Amidst this transformation, digital utilities are emerging as trusted energy advisors, bringing cutting-edge digital products to both external and internal end-user markets to meet the evolving needs and expectations of their customers and employees.
